body.name: GADIXY Smart Watch for Women (Answer/Make Calls),1.3" AMOLED Time Always-On-Display Smart Watches,IP68 Waterproof Fitness Trackers with Blood Pressure/SpO2/Sleep Monitor Smart Watch for Android iOS
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 10 mins
features: 💖【24H Health Caring for Women】:Smartwatch inlcude 4 main monitor functions: menstrual period,safe period,ovulation period and pregnancy period. Scientifically collected data offers you the most intimate care,smartwatch women's phone function is also equipped with the latest voice assistant.By simply talking, you can activate the assistance function on the women's watch,more detailed data can be found in your app.

📞【Make/Answer Bluetooth Calls 】: The women's smartwatch supports incoming calls, SMS,Twitter, Facebook,Instagram,WhatsApp and other message notifications as well as call notifications and the smart watch vibrates to notify you.Built-in speaker and high-performance microphone allow you to make/answer calls on smartwatch (the volume of the ringtone can be adjusted.)

💪【120+sportsmodes & Activity Tracker】:Smartwatch support over 120 sports modes,including outdoor or indoor,such as running, cycling,basketball,badminton which can track heart rate,calories burned,distance and steps during training. Adjust 6-8 exclusive sports to your own sports plan,creating your perfect curves.It is not necessary to take them off to wash your hands or when it rains.

💖【Invisible button& Message Notify】:The two buttons are embedded inside the smartwatch watches,integrated with metal frame of the watch.It extremely highlights the elegance of women, at the same time facilitating daily life and fully considering the rationality of wearing.It compatible equipped with 2 straps: metal strap and silicone one,smartwatch can receive Facebook,Twitter,WhatsApp,Instagram message notifications.(NO send and reply message function)

⌚【AOD Mode&Long Battery Life】:Women's smart watch with AMOLED screen,the high-resolution 390x390 pixel screen ensures a clear and colourful display. The blood pressure watch offers 3-5 days of battery life on a single 2-hour charge.With speaker and high-performance microphone,you can make/answer calls on your smart watch.

🎨【Multifunctional Application】:women watch tracks your sleep quality,such as deep sleep, light sleep, wakeful sleep, REM sleep, including your heart rate for 24 hours, measure your blood oxygen and let you know how your body breathes. Note: The Android smartwatch is not suitable for swimming or showering with hot water.

1.32 AMOLED ALWAYS-ON DIAPLAY 1.32 AMOLED ALWAYS-ON DIAPLAY SMARTWATCH Smartwatch for women will persist in designing and producing products and experiences adhering to the highest quality standards, seamlessly integrating into people's lives, enabling them to realize their health and fitness objectives.

Can I reply to messages on my smartwatch? Smartwatches can only sync with phone notifications and receive messages, they cannot reply to messages. Can I wake it up by tapping the screen? Due to the mistouch prevention feature and gravity-sensitive design, you can wake up the screen by turning your wrist , or by pressing a button to wake up the screen. How to pair the watch with phone?is the smartwatch compatible with iPhone and Android system? 1.smartwatch is compatible with ios 9.0+ and android 6.0+ 2. turn on the bluetooth of phone ->Download "FitCloudPro" from App Store ->Scan the QR code on the watch screen ->Follow the instruction. (Bluetooth signal works within 10-15meters)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars May want to look at a different smart watch
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to purchase this smart watch. The style is very nice. The first thing I noticed is that the instructions are lacking, especially on how to charge and how to use all the features. They were very brief. I did not like that the weather app was in Celsius and not Fahrenheit. For the life of me I could not get the messages to appear on the watch and the feature for answering a call, the audio was very grainy. I also do not think the sleep monitor was working properly. Unfortunately I am returning this smart watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Option to an Apple Watch
reviews.reviewText: This watch is being purchased as an X Mas gift. If it lives up to the specs, it will make for a nice alternative to an expensive Apple watch . I will return to this review one the gift is given if there are any issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The functionality of watch is really catchy and this is my current everyday watch to wear.
